column2: Magnificent. All the panels are open. Ready to start the trap transcoding?
Okay, so open the clubhouse first.
Click on the button at the right to open the clubhouse.
So here goes. Let's start the transcoding.

Hmmm. So the process has started!
Looks like it's going to need to stay in the transcoding state for a while. 
I've seen this process before. It takes time, but trust me, it's worth the wait.
Hope you'll check back soon! Just one more step.
